item.description: Living in Light is a group forming after requests from the Living in Light movie night to view the movie again in segments to discuss the movie's concepts, chapter by chapter. This inspiring movie, narrated by Neal Donald Walsh, "examines the phenomenon of humanity awakening to the experience of divine consciousness" and features luminaries interviewed in beautiful backdrops of Maui, including Gangaji, Marabai Devi, Alan Cohen, Panache Desai, Elijah and Eli Jaxon-Bear. Refreshing...and lends itself to personal and group exploration. Come join us for viewing chapters of the movie (one or two per meeting) followed by a circle of conversation. This program will be a series of Meetups, each date will be announced on Meetup. Join us for one or all...even one time will offer a rich experience. Note: This is a leaderless group for anyone in exploration of spiritual awakening. The $15 is a recommended donation. All are welcome.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Living in Light Movie and Discussion group
